title: Ranked placing is bugged
body: hey I won 8/10 provisional games with great kda got bronze 2. My friend won 1 game and had a bad kda every game and dragged his team down and got bronze 1? What is this Riot? Thats dodgy guys. Honestly last year i won 5 out of 10 games in my provisionals and got silver 5. I dont understand how a player that won 8 games gets bronze 2 and a player that wins 1 gets bronze 1? Please explain. Btw i play supp if that helps.

replies.body:
You rank is not determined by how many games you win during your placements.  Instead he ranks determined by the MMR of the opponents you verse. 

Unfortunately this is uncontrollable by you.  Best of luck in your future ranked games.

It depends on what your Matchmade ranking (MMR) was from last season. Which is hidden, but a rough estimate is your win/loss ratio + what division you are. I assume your friends had a higher MMR while you had a lower MMR :)
